room_title: Escape room "The Great Twister Escape" by Tri-Cities Escape Game in Kingsport
room_description:
As you travel State Route 27 ... deep in the heart of Kansas … the skies are growing eerily dark. The largest tornado on record — spanning 4 miles wide with winds up to 285 mph — is on course to intercept your path. With no sign of refuge, your only hope is an abandoned farmhouse.

Once inside, you’ve entered a peculiar world of days gone by. Confused and and intrigued at a place where time has seemingly stood still for 75 years.

You must work fast to understand the maze of your surroundings and find the key to unlock the underground storm cellar. You have exactly one hour.
